description: This version of the childhood favorite was developed by the gang at America's Test Kitchen and originally published in Cook's Illustrated magazine back in 1998 We brought it to The Times when we profiled Christopher Kimball, then the grand poobah of America's Test Kitchen, in 2009 It calls for extra crunchy peanut butter, plus a full cup of roasted salted peanuts, which results in a super crunchy and delightfully salty-sweet treat.
title: Peanut Butter Cookies
title_page: Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This version of the childhood favorite was developed by the gang at America's Test Kitchen and originally published in Cook's Illustrated magazine back in 1998. We brought it to The Times when we profiled Christopher Kimball, then the grand poobah of America's Test Kitchen, in 2009. It calls for extra crunchy peanut butter, plus a full cup of roasted salted peanuts, which results in a super crunchy and delightfully salty-sweet treat.
Featured in: Whoâ€™s Sticking With Us?.
